scripts.release-win-ia32: HOME=~/.electron-gyp node-pre-gyp clean configure build --target_arch=ia32 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=1.2.5 --build-from-source && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=ia32 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=1.2.5 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell
scripts.install: HOME=~/.electron-gyp node-pre-gyp clean configure build --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=1.2.5 --build-from-source && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=1.2.5 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell
